channel.title: Error Connecting to Server
channel.description: So when I try to login my server it says, ' Error Connecting to Server ' It was up earlier, and I have the source running. My friend logged on earlier with no problem. Its online server. Im not using no-ip. I did portfoward, and used my ip. What to do? :s

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

in your client use 127.0…0.1 in freinds all others usethe no-ip adress or whatever

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

I had the same problem a while back,to stop this,try using a diffrent PC or change your Ip.

If you think it’s the server ,try getting a new source.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting to Server

item.description:
@Barrick wrote:

So when I try to login my server it says, ’ Error Connecting to Server ’ It was up earlier, and I have the source running. My friend logged on earlier with no problem. Its online server. Im not using no-ip. I did portfoward, and used my ip. What to do? :s
